item.title: ≠kagara's fight with !haunu in the east
item.summary: See ≠kágára and !haunu, who fought each other with lightning. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-30 8637-8648). |han≠kass'o's grandmothers used to tell him that ≠kagara was fighting with !haunu in the east when the weather thundered and when the clouds resembled mountains and were thick.
item.comments: 1) See also ≠kagara and !haunu, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-30
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
